hero.subtitle: We verify licenses, reputation, and identity so you don't have to. For professionals, it's a badge of honor. For clients, it's peace of mind.

howWeVerify.title: How We Verify
howWeVerify.integrationNote: Seamlessly integrates with your existing website via a simple script.

identity.title: Identity & License Check
identity.description: We cross-reference government databases to validate real estate licenses and business registration IDs.

reputation.title: Reputation Audit
reputation.description: We scan public records and review platforms for history of malpractice or unresolved consumer complaints.

address.title: Address Verification
address.description: We verify physical office locations to ensure the business is established and accessible.

dataIntegrity.title: Trust, Transparency & Data Privacy
dataIntegrity.description: We believe that verification shouldn't come at the cost of privacy. EstateTrust adheres to the strictest GDPR and data protection standards.

features.noStorage: We verify without storing sensitive documents permanently.
features.noSelling: No selling of professional data to third-party marketers.

listedProfessionals.title: Listed Professionals
listedProfessionals.subtitle: Connect with verified individual agents and brokers.

pricing.title: Who is EstateTrust For?
pricing.subtitle: Select the verification plan that matches your business size.

individual.name: Individual Professional
individual.description: Perfect for any real estate professional starting their verification journey.
features: Verified profile page with SEO-optimized backlink
Digital verification badge for your website

boutique.name: Boutique Team
boutique.description: For small agencies and teams (2-10 agents).
features: Agency profile page with team directory

ctaSection.title: Are you a Real Estate Professional?
ctaSection.description: Join thousands of verified agents. Gain a high-quality backlink, build instant trust, and stand out in a crowded market.

footer.tagline: The global standard for trust and transparency in the real estate industry.
